page.syntax: Data as A = .Data(ColumnIndex as N | ColumnName as C)

argument.name: SQL::Row
argument.description: A SQL::Row object created with a DIM statement.

argument.name: ColumnIndex
argument.description: The index of the column containing the data.

argument.name: ColumnName
argument.description: The name of the column containing the data.

page.description: Get the value of the data column specified.
page.discussion: The Data() method returns the data in the specified column.
page.example: dim conn as SQL::Connection dim rs as SQL::ResultSet dim row as SQL::Row dim connString as C dim select_exp as C connString = "{A5API='Access', FileName='c:\program files\a5v8\mdbfiles\alphasports.mdb'}" select_exp = "select * from customer where bill_state_region = 'ny'" if .not. conn.open(connString) ui_msg_box("Error", conn.CallResult.text) end end if if .not. conn.execute(select_exp) ui_msg_box("Error", conn.CallResult.text) conn.close() end end if rs = conn.ResultSet rs.NextRow() row = rs.CurrentRow ui_msg_box("Column Data By Name", "" + row.Data("lastname")) ui_msg_box("Column Data By Number", "" + row.Data(2)) conn.close()
